item.description:
Join Members of both the South Shore Fitness Meetup Group (SSFMG) and the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group (SSDOMG) for our first Nutritious Meals Workshop presented by our Fitness Professional, Rob! Rob will be teaching us how to prepare a variety of nutritious meals, including a Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner and Snack. We will get to help make the items and enjoy them as well!


Who? YOU!

What? Nutritious Meal Workshop

When? Sunday, March 30th @ 12-2pm

Where? Angela's Condo

Why? To learn some new nutritious meals!

How much? $15 for the Nutritious Meal Workshop payable to Rob plus $2 Event Fee for a total of $17 per person (Please try to bring exact change.)

How many? Min. of 6 by March 24th; Max of 12 combined for both Groups.

Join us as we sample and learn how to make nutritious meals and snacks.

Organizers: Angela and Rob

RSVP Deadlines: NOON on Thursday, March 28th so we have enough time to buy all of he ingredients. If you have any allergies please note them in your RSVP Comments.

Please RSVP so we will know whether or not to expect you. If you belong to both Groups please RSVP for both Groups but you may only RSVP "Yes" with one Group.

Directions will be emailed to all Yes RSVPs shortly after the RSVP Deadline.
item.how_to_find_us: You will have directions that will take you right to my door!
item.why: Rob is an excellent trainer, this is a fun group, and we motivate each other.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Nutritious Meals Workshop!
